segments.text: I'm watching this scene unfold, and I can't help but feel a growing frustration.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is standing right there, her foot literally in a puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can she not notice the water pouring from the sink?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's absolutely baffling to me how unaware someone can be in their own kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And those children! They're practically performing acrobatics for cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That stool is going to tip over any second, I just know it will.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're making a huge mess and putting themselves in danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole situation is just a recipe for disaster and chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I want to yell at them to stop, to look around!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This level of oblivious behavior is simply unacceptable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to step in and prevent all these accidents from happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's infuriating to watch such preventable problems pile up.
segments.speaker: PAR
